title.narrative: Improving access to quality, inclusive and comprehensive eye health services in rural Rwanda

description.narrative: People from four rural districts in Rwanda: Huye, Karongi, Nyagatare and Gicumbi will have improved access to quality, inclusive and comprehensive eye health services. In the long term, this will contribute to reduced prevalence of avoidable blindness and visual impairment, increased economic productivity, reduced poverty and improved quality of life in Rwanda.

activity-date.narrative: The planned starting date was 15th of January 2020, but the project was paused and the actual starting date is 15th of November 2020.
